name: Gambler: Rolling the Dice!
description:
Gambler: Rolling the Dice is a very short RPG Maker MV experience!

Take control of Gambler, a man who used to chance it all for pleasure - until a curse by Dice, a malicious wizard, forced him to roll the dice on every significant thing he did! Displeased by these unpleasant series of events, he sets out on a quest to remove dice - and Dice - from his life forever! Will he make it through this RPG turn-based luck-based adventure? It's all up to the roll of the dice!

Expected Runtime: Around 5 minutes

Credits:

Rahul Sharma - Programmer

Brian Kim - Writing, Maps, Programmer

Janie Chen - Music

Sound effects, art assets (aside from the flower sprite),  other music tracks and the RPG Maker MV engine belong to Kadokawa, Gotcha Gotcha Games, and Yoji Ojima.
